charges.charge_description: 18:2113A.F BANK ROBBERY BY FORCE OR VIOLENCE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: a total term of imprisonment of 117 months, this sentence consists of terms of 33 months as to Count 1 and a term of 84 months as to Count 2, to be served consecutively; a term of supervised release of 5 years, this term consists of 5 years as to each of Counts 1 and 2, to run concurrently; restitution in the amount of $732.00; a special assessment of $200.00
